mapper.sql: settle_batch_id, settle_time, settle_type, settle_zone, settle_by, profit_amt, profit_bal, bu_code, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, row_id
mapper.select: SELECT sb.*, count(o.order_id) order_count,sum(o.amount) order_amount,sum(sd.rebate_amt) rebateAmt FROM ac_settle_batch sb JOIN ac_settle_details sd ON sd.settle_batch_id = sb.settle_batch_id JOIN mc_order o ON o.order_id = sd.order_id JOIN sh_zone z on z.zone_code = o.zone_code WHERE sb.settle_batch_id = #{settleBatchId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND sb.settle_zone = z.zone_type

select
from ac_settle_batch
order by settle_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into ac_settle_batch (settle_batch_id, settle_time, settle_type, settle_zone, settle_by, profit_amt, profit_bal, bu_code, created_by, created_date, last_updated_by, last_updated_date, row_id) values (#{settleBatchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{profitBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{buCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update ac_settle_batch
settle_time = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
settle_type = #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settle_zone = #{settleZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settle_by = #{settleBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profit_amt = #{profitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
profit_bal = #{profitBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bu_code = #{buCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where settle_batch_id = #{settleBatchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ac_settle_batch
settle_time = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
settle_type = #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settle_zone = #{settleZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
settle_by = #{settleBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profit_amt = #{profitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
profit_bal = #{profitBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bu_code = #{buCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_updated_by = #{currentUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_updated_date = now(),
row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where settle_batch_id = #{settleBatchId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ac_settle_batch set settle_time = #{settleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, settle_type = #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settle_zone = #{settleZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settle_by = #{settleBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profit_amt = #{profitAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, profit_bal = #{profitBal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bu_code = #{buCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_updated_date = #{lastUpdatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where settle_batch_id = #{settleBatchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
